meanings.definition: The quality or state of being able to be heard.
meanings.sent1: The audibilities of the music in the concert hall were impressive.
meanings.sent2: The audibilities of the birds chirping in the morning were soothing.
meanings.sent3: The audibilities of the whispering ghosts in the haunted house made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The audibilities of the city's heartbeat could be felt in every corner.
meanings.sent5: The audibilities of the thunderstorm were like a symphony of nature.

meanings.definition: The range within which sounds may be heard.
meanings.sent1: The audibilities of the teacher's voice reached every student in the classroom.
meanings.sent2: The audibilities of the distant train whistle faded as it moved away.
meanings.sent3: The audibilities of the sneaky cat's meows surprised the family.
meanings.sent4: The audibilities of the ocean's waves seemed to stretch endlessly.
meanings.sent5: The audibilities of the forest at night were filled with mysterious sounds.
